Package connectfour

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CfCell
    This class holds the properties of a connect four circle.
    ConnectFour
    This class creates a JFrame to add the ConnectFourGUI to it and provides different options as well like exiting the game, and the option of creating a new game with a player or AI.
    ConnectFourGame
    This class is the controller of the MVC design, it creates a fully functional connect four game board and makes all decisions regarding the state of the game.
    ConnectFourGUI
    This class is the view of the MVC design, it creates and handles all of the GUI components of a connect four game.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    GameStatus
    This enum is used to easily track the status of the connect four game.
    Player
    This enum is used to easily track which player owns what cell and also to keep track of whose turn it is.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Matthew Shampine
